titleStmt.title: Remarks on a book entituled Prince Arthur, an heroick poem with some general critical observations and several new remarks upon Virgil / by Mr. Dennis.
titleStmt.author: Dennis, John, 1657-1734.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S. Heyrick and R. Sare ...,
